Sentencas: Lanthanum silicate apatite (LSA, La9.33+xSi6O26+1.5x, x = 0-0.67) has been widely investigated as a promising electrolyte material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis and densification of lanthanum silicate apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell via co-precipitation method

Sentencas: In this work, a facile and low-cost co-precipitation method is used to synthesize LSA precursor powders.
Titulo: Synthesis and densification of lanthanum silicate apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell via co-precipitation method
Synthesis and densification of lanthanum silicate apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell via co-precipitation method

Sentencas: 70 nm) with pure hexagonal LSA phase are obtained by calcining the precursor at 900 degrees C. Impurity of La2SiO5, caused by the different precipitation productivities of La(NO3)(3) and TEOS, can be eliminated through lowering the La/Si ratio in the starting mixtures.
Titulo: Synthesis and densification of lanthanum silicate apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell via co-precipitation method

Sentencas: The dispersant (PEG200) plays a crucial role in co-precipitation processes, which can effectively mitigate the agglomeration and therefore significantly improve the sinterability of the nanoparticles.
Titulo: Synthesis and densification of lanthanum silicate apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell via co-precipitation method

Sentencas: Dense LSA ceramic with relative density of 98% is obtained after sintering at 1550 degrees C, which exhibits a conductivity of 0.13 mS cm(-1) at 500 degrees C. (C) 2013
Titulo: Synthesis and densification of lanthanum silicate apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell via co-precipitation method
